Total training hours: Total number of hours spent by learners on learning activities
Avg. Daily Usage: Average number of hours spent by learners daily on learning activities
ILT Enrolled Rate: Percentage of learners who have enrolled in Instructor-Led Training (ILT) session
ILT Dropout Rate: Percentage of learners who enrolled in Instructor-Led Training (ILT) sessions but did not complete them.
VILT Enrolled Rate: Percentage of learners who have enrolled in Virtual Instructor-Led Training (VILT) session
VILT Dropout Rate: Percentage of learners who enrolled in Virtual Instructor-Led Training (VILT) sessions but did not complete them.
